document.masterDocTitle: A revision of the Habrocerinae of the world. V. A new species of Habrocerus from China and additional records (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae)

C o m m e n t: Originally native in the West Palaearctic region,
H. capillaricornis
is represented in nearly all major zoogeographic regions today.
